commands.name: az monitor diagnostic-settings create
commands.summary: Create diagnostic settings for the specified resource. For more information, visit: https://learn.microsoft.com/rest/api/monitor/diagnosticsettings/createorupdate#metricsettings.
commands.syntax:
az monitor diagnostic-settings create --name
                                      --resource
                                      [--event-hub]
                                      [--event-hub-rule]
                                      [--export-to-resource-specific {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--logs]
                                      [--marketplace-partner-id]
                                      [--metrics]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--resource-namespace]
                                      [--resource-parent]
                                      [--resource-type]
                                      [--storage-account]
                                      [--workspace]

commands.name: az monitor diagnostic-settings delete
commands.summary: Deletes existing diagnostic settings for the specified resource.

commands.name: az monitor diagnostic-settings list
commands.summary: Gets the active diagnostic settings list for the specified resource.

commands.name: az monitor diagnostic-settings show
commands.summary: Gets the active diagnostic settings for the specified resource.

commands.name: az monitor diagnostic-settings update
commands.summary: Update diagnostic settings for the specified resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor diagnostic-settings update --name
                                      --resource
                                      [--add]
                                      [--event-hub]
                                      [--event-hub-rule]
                                      [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--log-ana-dtype]
                                      [--logs]
                                      [--marketplace-partner-id]
                                      [--metrics]
                                      [--remove]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--resource-namespace]
                                      [--resource-parent]
                                      [--resource-type]
                                      [--service-bus-rule-id]
                                      [--set]
                                      [--storage-account-id]
                                      [--workspace-id]
